name: Pokémon TCG Online

game.exe: drive_c/users/$USER/Application Data/Pokémon Trading Card Game Online/PokemonTradingCardGameOnline/Pokemon Trading Card Game Online.exe

content:
files:
- pokemon: https://tcgo-installer.s3.amazonaws.com/PokemonInstaller.msi
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: "drive_c/users/$USER/Application Data/Pok\xE9mon Trading Card Game Online/PokemonTradingCardGameOnline/Pokemon\
    \ Trading Card Game Online.exe"
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /i "$CACHE/pokemon/PokemonInstaller.msi" /q
    executable: msiexec
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
